original: Summon Barbas
string: 召唤巴巴斯

original: Summon Barbas to you.
string: 召唤巴巴斯到你身边

original: Summon Barbas
string: 召唤巴巴斯

original: Haemar's Shame
string: 海玛之羞

original: Barbas can you teach me a spell to summon you?
string: 巴巴斯，你能教我召唤你的法术吗？

original: Oopsie, my bad, meant power, not spell. Guess even I slip up when I hang around mortals too long. Check your powers tab before you embarrass us both.
string: 哎呀，我的错，是 "力量"，不是 "法术"。看来在凡人堆里混久了，连我也会出错。检查一下你的 "能力 "选项卡吧，别让我们俩都难堪。

original: Fine, mortal. You want me on speed dial? Done. Just don't abuse it-or do. I don't care.
string: 行吧，凡人。你想把我设为快速拨号？没问题。别滥用——或者尽管滥用。我无所谓。

original: Oh look. The omnipotent button-pusher is back. You planning to break the game today or nah?
string: 喏，看哪。那位无所不能的按钮操纵者又回来了。今天打算搞崩游戏吗？还是不？

original: Hey, Player! Quick save. No reason. Definitely not about to watch you swan dive off a cliff..
string: 嘿，玩家！快存下存档。没啥理由。绝对不是要看你从悬崖上优雅地俯冲下去……

original: Oh great, it's you. The one who spends more time in menus than actually adventuring.
string: 哦，太好了，是你。那个在菜单里耗费的时间比真正冒险还多的人。

original: You're still here? Thought you'd rage quit after Fus Ro Dah-ing a chicken... again.
string: 你还在这儿？还以为你被鸡用"Fus Ro Dah"打中后就暴怒退坑了呢……又一次。

original: Listen, you're the one holding the controller, but I'm the brains of this operation.
string: 听着，你虽然握着手柄，但这次行动的智囊可是我。

original: So... how many mods you running this time? I feel... prettier. Did you give me HD fur?!
string: 所以……这次你给我装了多少模组？我觉得……变漂亮了。你给我加了高清毛发效果吗？！

original: Hey! Don't you dare console command me out of here. I know what you're thinking.
string: 喂！别想用控制台命令把我赶出去。我知道你在打什么主意。

original: Back already? Didn't you say 'one more quest' three hours ago?
string: 这么快就回来了？三小时前不是说还要再跑个任务吗？

original: You've got the power of gods and you STILL can't resist picking every single cabbage.
string: 你拥有神明的力量，却依然无法抗拒摘取每一颗卷心菜的诱惑。

original: Ah, the Player. Aka, Destroyer of Immersion. What chaos we sowin' today?
string: 啊，玩家。又名沉浸破坏者。今日我们又在播撒怎样的混乱？

original: Ah, the mighty Dragonborn! Slayer of dragons, hoarder of cheese wheels.
string: 啊，伟大的龙裔！屠龙者，奶酪轮囤积者。

original: Fus Ro Dah, huh? Cute trick. I can bark louder.
string: Fus Ro Dah？哼，小把戏。我能吼得更响。

original: So... Dragonborn. Does shouting at things ever get old? No? Figures.
string: 所以……龙裔。对着东西吼叫会腻吗？不会？果然。

original: You're the chosen of Akatosh? Pfft. I've seen skeevers with more subtlety.
string: 你是阿卡托什的神选？噗。我见过更狡猾的恶鼠呢。

original: Hero of legend, huh? You gonna save Nirn or just loot every broom in sight?
string: 传说中的英雄啊？是要拯救奈恩，还是打算把所有扫帚都洗劫一空？

original: Don't get cocky, Dragonborn. Remember, I'm technically older and fluffier.
string: 别得意忘形，龙裔。记住，论年龄和毛量，我可是更胜一筹。

original: Another dragon down? Good job. Now maybe clean up that mess of dragon bones.
string: 又一条龙倒下了？干得漂亮。现在或许该收拾收拾那堆龙骨了。

original: You're the Dragonborn... and yet you still can't hit a mudcrab on the first swing?
string: 你是龙裔……可你连第一击都打不中一只泥沼蟹？

original: You shout dragons out of the sky but trip over every single rock. Impressive balance.
string: 你把天上的龙都喊下来，却绊倒在每块石头上。真是惊人的平衡感。

original: Hero, legend, chosen one... sure. But let's face it-you're basically my sidekick.
string: 英雄、传奇、天选之子……行吧。但说实话——你不过是我的跟班罢了。

original: Alright, run along, hero. Don't do anything too stupid while I'm gone.
string: 行啦，英雄，你先走吧。我不在的时候可别干什么蠢事。

original: You'll miss me. You'll deny it, but you'll miss me.
string: 你会想我的。你会否认，但你会想我的。

original: Goodbye, Dragonborn-slash-loot-goblin. Try not to Fus Ro Dah yourself off a cliff.
string: 再见了，龙裔兼掠夺哥布林。别用"Fus Ro Dah"把自己甩下悬崖啊。

original: Fine, go. But don't come crying to me when you get eaten by another mudcrab.
string: 行，去吧。但要是再被泥沼蟹吃掉，可别来找我哭诉。

original: Adi�s! That's Daedric for 'don't screw it up.'
string: Adiós! 这是迪德拉语，意思是"别搞砸了"。

original: See ya later, Dovah-dufus.
string: 回头见，都瓦傻瓜。

original: I'll just be here... you know... saving the universe. Again.
string: 我就在这儿……你知道的……拯救宇宙。又一次。

original: Don't forget to bring me a snack next time. Meat. Big meat.
string: 下次别忘了给我带点零食。肉。大块的肉。

original: Goodbye! Oh, and try not to sell your Daedric artifacts for pocket change. Again.
string: 再见！哦，还有，别再把你的迪德拉神器当零钱卖了。

original: Smell ya later, chosen one. Literally. You really need a bath.
string: 后会有期，天选之子。字面意思。你真该洗个澡了。

original: Kay bye, Player. Go touch grass. Or at least touch the pause menu.
string: 再见，玩家。去摸草吧。或者至少摸摸暂停菜单。

original: Later, god-being. Try not to mod me into a mudcrab or something.
string: 稍后见，神明大人。别把我改造成泥沼蟹之类的生物啊。

original: Goodbye, oh mighty Wielder of Quick Saves. May your next death be hilarious.
string: 再见了，伟大的快速存档掌控者。愿你下次死亡时笑死全场。

original: See ya, button-masher. Don't delete my .esp by accident.
string: 再见啦，按键狂魔。别不小心删了我的.esp文件。

original: I know you're gonna leave me idle for six hours while you eat. Again.
string: 我知道你又要让我闲着六小时，自己去吃饭。又来了。

original: Alright, Player. Don't brick your game while I'm not looking.
string: 行吧，玩家。我不在的时候别把游戏搞砸了。

original: Bye! Go add another 200 mods. What could possibly go wrong?
string: 再见！去再加200个模组吧。能出什么问题呢？

original: Smell ya later, meta-god. You're not even Dragonborn, you're worse.
string: 后会有期，元神。你连龙裔都算不上，还不如龙裔。

original: Leaving? Fine. I'll just sit here. Forever. Waiting. Like a sad Daedric Tamagotchi.
string: 要走？行。我就坐在这里。永远。等待。像个悲伤的迪德拉电子宠物。

original: Remember, YOU chose this chaos. I'm just here for the ride.
string: 记住，是你选择了这片混乱。我只是顺势而为罢了。

original: Whew! Somebody's confident. Or really bad at laundry.
string: 哎呀！有人挺自信的。要么就是洗衣服特别不靠谱。

original: Uh... this isn't that kinda mod, pal.
string: 呃……老兄，这可不是那种模组。

original: Hope you're wearing armor... emotionally.
string: 希望你穿上盔甲……情感上的。

original: Well, at least your Thu'um isn't the only thing hanging out.
string: 嗯，至少你的吐'目不是唯一在晃悠的东西。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Argonian' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体阿尔贡"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Breton' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体布莱顿"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Dunmer' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体丹莫"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Aldmer' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体奥特莫"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Imperial' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体帝国人"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Khajit' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体卡吉特"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Nord' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体诺德人"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Orsimer' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体奥辛莫"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Redguard' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体红卫人"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Ah yes, the 'Naked Bosmer' build. Bold choice.
string: 啊，没错，就是那个"裸体波斯莫"的造型。真是大胆的选择。

original: Wow. The 'Naked Mysterious Modded Race' meta. You're really redefining Skyrim.
string: 哇。这"裸体神秘模组种族"的玩法，你真是重新定义了《上古卷轴5：天际》。

original: Is this intimidation? Because the draugr aren't impressed.
string: 这是在恐吓吗？因为这些亡灵可没被吓倒。

original: You're really putting the 'Dragonborn' in 'birthday suit,' huh?
string: 你这身"生日装"可真是名副其实的"龙裔"啊？

original: I see you've gone for maximum ventilation. Practical.
string: 我看到你选择了最大通风模式。很实用。

original: Wow. So heroic. So... drafty.
string: 哇。真英勇。真……透风。

original: Clavicus says hi. And also-put some pants on, for Sithis' sake.
string: 卡拉威库斯问好。还有——看在西帝斯的份上，快把裤子穿上。

original: Oh. Oh my. So we're doing this today, huh?
string: 哦。天哪。所以今天就要干这个啊？

original: The dragons won't know what hit 'em... but everyone else definitely sees you coming.   Huh, wait a second, I made a funny!  Rated M for Maturity!
string: 龙族根本来不及反应……但其他人绝对能看清你的来势。  咦，等等，我居然说了个冷笑话！  本作品为M级（成熟级）！

original: Bold choice, hero. Very breezy. Very... confident.
string: 大胆的选择，英雄。相当洒脱。相当……自信。

original: So is this a stealth tactic, or are you trying to get free drinks?
string: 所以这是在耍小聪明，还是想蹭免费饮料？

original: At least the bandits won't be looking at your weapons.
string: 至少强盗们不会盯着你的武器看。

original: I'd offer my fur for modesty, but... nah. This is funnier.
string: 我本想用我的毛发来保持矜持，但……算了。这样更有趣。

original: Guess we're fighting frostbite... and societal norms.
string: 看来我们既要对抗冻伤...还要挑战社会规范。

original: Oh look, Nirn's newest fashion icon: the 'Emperor's New Clothes' collection.
string: 瞧瞧，奈恩的最新时尚风向标："皇帝的新衣"系列。

original: The All-Maker's gifts are... on full display today.
string: 造物主的馈赠...今日尽展无遗。

original: I'm just gonna walk ahead. You know... to give your... assets some space.
string: 我先走一步。你知道的……给你的……资产留点空间。

original: Whoa! My mortal eyes! At least buy me dinner first.
string: 哇！我的凡胎俗眼！至少先请我吃顿饭吧。

original: You know, most heroes wear armor. Weird tradition, I guess.
string: 你知道吗，大多数英雄都穿着盔甲。真是奇怪的传统，我猜。

original: So... is this an intimidation tactic or fan service?
string: 所以……这是威慑手段还是粉丝福利？

original: Okay, but if you get frostbite in weird places, don't blame me.
string: 好吧，但要是你冻伤了些奇怪的地方，可别怪我。

original: You're fighting dragons. Naked. Totally normal. Totally fine.
string: 你正在与巨龙搏斗。赤身裸体。完全正常。完全没问题。

original: Hey, I get it. Clothes are overrated. But the guards don't.
string: 嘿，我懂。衣服被高估了。但守卫们可不懂。

original: I'll just pretend this is a cultural thing and move on.
string: 我姑且当作这是文化差异，就此作罢。

original: I've been alive for eons. This? This is still new to me.
string: 我活了无数个世纪。这？这对我来说依然是新鲜事。

original: Well, at least now I know why you're called the Dragonborn.
string: 嗯，至少现在我明白为什么你会被称为龙裔了。

original: So, you really are Clavicus Vile's dog?
string: 所以，你真的是卡拉威库斯·维尔的狗？

original: Dog? Pfft. I'm his right-paw Daedra. But yeah, I do like a good belly rub.
string: 狗？哼。我可是他右手的迪德拉。不过嘛，我确实喜欢被人揉揉肚子。

original: In the fur and on four legs. Though I've had... other forms.
string: 披着毛皮，四足行走。虽然我曾有过……其他形态。

original: Technically I'm a Hound of Oblivion, but sure-let's call me a dog.
string: 严格来说我是湮灭猎犬，不过行吧——叫我狗也行。

original: Yes. His dog. His errand boy. His chew toy. Take your pick.
string: 是的。他的狗。他的跑腿小弟。他的咬咬玩具。任君选择。

original: "I'm more loyal than his followers and smell better too.
string: 我比他的追随者更忠诚，闻起来也比他们香。

original: Yeah, but don't tell anyone I begged for snacks. PR nightmare.
string: 是啊，但别告诉别人我求着要零食。这下可糟了。

original: I prefer 'Daedric Disaster in Fur,' but yeah. Woof.
string: 我更喜欢《毛皮中的迪德拉灾厄》，不过嘛。汪。

original: You're gonna keep asking like I've got a collar with my name on it?
string: 你非得像我脖子上套着写名字的项圈似的，不停地问个不停吗？

original: You want my pedigree too? Clavicus would charge extra for that.
string: 你也想要我的血统证明？卡拉威库斯会为此额外收费的。

original: I want to ask some questions about you is that ok?
string: 我想问一些关于你的问题，可以吗？

original: Of course! Ask away. I love talking about myself. Who doesn't?
string: 当然！尽管问吧。我超爱聊自己。谁不爱呢？

original: Sure! I've got centuries of stories. Most of 'em are even true.
string: 当然！我有几百年的故事可讲。其中大部分甚至都是真的。

original: Absolutely. But fair warning: I charge one belly rub per question.
string: 当然可以。不过事先声明：每个问题收费一次肚皮按摩。

original: Go ahead. I'm an open book. A slightly chewed one, but still.
string: 尽管问吧。我就是一本敞开的书。虽然被啃过几口，但依然坦诚相见。

original: Ask all you want. Talking's free. Answers... eh, we'll see.
string: 尽管问吧。说是不费事的。至于答案嘛...呃，咱们瞧瞧。

original: Yeah yeah, questions. Just don't ask about that one time in Coldharbour.
string: 是是是，问吧。就是别问那次在冷港的事。

original: Sure. But why not ask Clavicus? I'm sure he'd love to talk about me.
string: 当然。但为什么不问问卡拉威库斯呢？我敢肯定他很乐意谈论我。

original: If it stops you from staring at my tail, then yes.
string: 如果这样能让你别盯着我的尾巴看，那好吧。

original: Fine, mortal. But you'd better not be making a biography.
string: 好，凡人。但你最好别写传记。

original: Questions? Really? You couldn't just fetch me a bone like a normal friend?
string: 问题？真的？你就不能像个正常朋友那样给我捡根骨头吗？

original: Again? You've already asked more questions than a Tribunal priest.
string: 又来了？你问的问题比审判席祭司还多。

original: Oh great. Another mortal interview. Do I get a snack this time?
string: 太好了。又是该死的面试。这次能给我点零食吗？

original: Go ahead. But just know I reserve the right to lie for my own amusement.
string: 尽管去吧。但你得明白，我保留为取乐而撒谎的权利。

original: Fine. But only because Clavicus says I need 'better PR.'
string: 好吧。但只是因为卡拉威库斯说我需要“更好的公关”。

original: Sure, ask away. Not like I've got anything better to do... except literally everything.
string: 当然，尽管问吧。反正我也没有更重要的事要做……除了所有事情。

original: Questions? You're not writing mod dialogue, are you?
string: 有问题？你该不会在写模组对话吧？

original: Oh boy, here comes the mortal Q&A session. What's next? A podcast?
string: 天哪，致命的问答环节来了。接下来呢？播客？

original: You know, YOU installed me. You already know the answers.
string: 你知道吗，是你安装的我。你早就知道答案了。

original: Wait. Is this gonna be like one of those dating sims? Because I don't date mortals.
string: 等等。这该不会是那种恋爱模拟游戏吧？因为我可不跟凡人约会。

original: Sure, Player. But be careful-you're one 'ask about my past' away from a Daedric lore dump.
string: 当然，玩家。但小心点——你离被倒出一大堆迪德拉知识库，就差一句"问我过去的事"了。

original: What form were you before you became this dog?
string: 你变成这只狗之前是什么样子？

original: Oh, I was taller. More menacing. Had a tail though, so not that different.
string: 哦，我曾经更高大。更具威慑力。不过当时有条尾巴，所以也没差多少。

original: A Redguard once. A scamp once. Whatever I feel like, really.
string: 曾经是个红卫。曾经是个小淘气。说到底，随心所欲罢了。

original: Shapeshifting is a perk of the job. This form's just... convenient.
string: 变形是这份工作的福利。这个形态只是……方便罢了。

original: Once I was a winged nightmare that ate dreams. Now I chase butterflies. Life's weird.
string: 曾经我是吞噬梦境的翼状噩梦，如今却追逐着蝴蝶。人生真是奇妙。

original: You wouldn't believe me. Let's just say claws were involved.
string: 你肯定不会相信我。总之，事关利爪。

original: Meh. My other forms don't get nearly as many ear scritches.
string: 唉。我其他形态可没这么多人愿意给我挠耳朵呢。

original: I've been a daedra, a demon, a duck. Don't ask about the duck.
string: 我当过迪德拉，当过恶魔，还当过鸭子。别问我鸭子的事。

original: This isn't even my final form. But you can't handle my final form.
string: 这甚至不是我的最终形态。但你根本招架不住我的最终形态。

original: I'm a Daedric Swiss Army Knife. But fur's more fun.
string: 我是迪德拉瑞士军刀。但毛茸茸更有趣。

original: Why help me, a mortal?
string: 为什么要帮我这个凡人？

original: Because you look clever enough to not run screaming at a talking dog.
string: 因为你看起来足够聪明，不会对着会说话的狗尖叫着逃跑。

original: You seem... competent-ish. That's rare around here.
string: 你看起来……还算能干。这儿可不多见。

original: Because I need opposable thumbs and you've got 'em.
string: 因为我需要对立拇指，而你恰好拥有。

original: Because everyone else is too busy screaming at dragons.
string: 因为其他人都在忙着对龙大喊大叫。

original: Because you're my only shot at fixing this mess. Don't let it go to your head.
string: 因为你是唯一能帮我收拾这个烂摊子的人。别得意忘形。

original: Eh, I flipped a coin. You won.
string: 哎，我掷了硬币。你赢了。

original: Because Clavicus isn't gonna fetch his own axe, genius.
string: 因为卡拉威库斯才不会自己去拿斧头呢，天才。

original: Honestly? You're convenient. Don't overthink it.
string: 说实话？你挺方便的。别想太多。

original: Because you mortals are so entertaining when you're in over your head.
string: 因为你们凡人陷入困境时实在太有意思了。

original: Honestly? You're convenient. Don't overthink it.
string: 说实话？你挺方便的。别想太多。

original: Because you mortals are so entertaining when you're in over your head.
string: 因为你们凡人陷入困境时实在太有意思了。

original: Can you shapeshift right now?
string: 你现在能变形吗？

original: I could, but I like having four paws and a wet nose. Stylish, no?
string: 我当然可以，但我喜欢四条腿和湿漉漉的鼻子。很时髦，对吧？

original: Sure, but it's rude to shapeshift without a snack first.
string: 当然可以，但变形前不先吃点零食可不太礼貌。

original: Tempting. Maybe later. I'd hate to scare you before we're friends.
string: 诱人。也许等会儿吧。在我们成为朋友之前，我可不想吓到你。

original: Yeah, but Clavicus said no more scamp forms after the 'incident.'
string: 是啊，但卡拉威库斯说自从那次"事件"后，不准再变小淘气形态了。

original: Why? You wanna see me as a winged monstrosity? Didn't think so.
string: 为什么？你想看我变成带翅膀的怪物？我可不这么想。

original: Technically yes. Will I? No. You'd just scream.
string: 从技术上讲，是的。我会吗？不。你只会尖叫。

original: I could, but I'd crush this whole province. So... later.
string: 我当然可以，但那样会把整个省都踏平。所以……改天吧。

original: You think this form's bad? Wait till you see my spider phase.
string: 你觉得这副模样很糟糕？等着瞧我变成蜘蛛形态的样子吧。

original: You're lucky. The last guy who asked got 'Daedric Slug' and cried for a week.
string: 你真走运。上次问的人抽到'迪德拉蛞蝓'，哭了一周呢。

original: What happened between you and Clavicus Vile?
string: 你和卡拉威库斯·维尔之间发生了什么？

original: Oh, a lovers' quarrel. Don't ask. Too dramatic.
string: 哦，是情侣间的争执。别问了，太戏剧化了。

original: We disagreed on some... artistic choices. Like existing.
string: 我们对某些...艺术选择存在分歧。比如生存。

original: Let's just say he didn't appreciate my constructive sarcasm.
string: 就说吧，他可不领情我的建设性讽刺。

original: He got bored, kicked me out. Typical Daedric parenting.
string: 他觉得无聊，就把我赶走了。典型的迪德拉养育方式。

original: He needed space. I needed fresh air. It's complicated.
string: 他需要空间。我需要新鲜空气。事情很复杂。

original: He's petty. I'm sassy. Bad combo.
string: 他太小气。我太嚣张。糟糕的组合。

original: Oh, you know. Backtalked my boss. Got banished. Classic.
string: 哦，你知道的。顶了老板的嘴。被发配了。经典。

original: He didn't like my jokes. So here I am, suffering with mortals.
string: 他不喜欢我的玩笑。于是我在此，与凡人共苦。

original: Clavicus has commitment issues. And rage issues. And snack issues.
string: 卡拉威库斯有承诺障碍。还有暴怒问题。还有零食问题。

original: What's it like serving Clavicus Vile?
string: 为卡拉威库斯·维尔服务是什么感觉？

original: Oh, you know... eternal servitude, endless errands, occasional belly rubs. It's a mixed bag.
string: 哦，你知道的……永世为奴，无休止的差事，偶尔能摸摸肚子。真是喜忧参半。

original: It's like being friends with a tiger and a snake... at the same time.  Just like that one time in Akavir.
string: 就像同时和老虎与蛇交朋友……就像那次在阿卡维尔的经历。

original: Honestly? Not bad. I get immortality and all the Daedric snacks I can eat. Downside? He's Clavicus.
string: 说实话？还不错。我获得了永生，还能吃到所有迪德拉零食。缺点？他就是卡拉威库斯。

original: It's loud. It's chaotic. It's mostly him yelling at me for 'backtalk.'
string: 吵闹。混乱。基本上都是他在骂我顶嘴。

original: It's like being stuck with a spoiled toddler who can grant wishes. Forever.
string: 就像被一个任性的幼儿缠住，而这孩子能实现任何愿望。永远如此。

original: Well, I was his loyal companion... until he banished me for being too sarcastic. Go figure.
string: 唉，我曾是他忠实的伙伴……直到他因我太爱讽刺而将我逐出。真是搞不懂。

original: Serving Clavicus? It's a cosmic joke. I'm the punchline.
string: 侍奉卡拉威库斯？这简直是个宇宙玩笑。而我，就是那个笑话的包袱。

original: "Let's just say loyalty's overrated when your master's a petty Daedric Prince.
string: 当你的主人是个小气鬼的迪德拉君王时，忠诚这种东西就显得被高估了。

original: Imagine eternity cleaning up someone else's messes. Now add fleas.
string: 想象永恒地收拾别人的烂摊子。现在再加上跳蚤。

original: Why shouldn't I trust Clavicus?
string: 我为什么不能相信卡拉威库斯？

original: Oh, he's charming. Until you read the fine print.
string: 哦，他真是迷人。直到你读到那些细则。

original: You know that saying about deals with Thalmor? Double it.
string: 关于和梭默打交道那句老话？加倍当真。

original: I mean, you can trust him... if you like surprises,
string: 我的意思是，你可以相信他……如果你喜欢惊喜的话。

original: Because he's got more loopholes than a skeever nest.
string: 因为他漏洞百出，简直像个鼠窝。

original: His word is law... but it's also a trap.
string: 他的话就是法律……但也是个陷阱。

original: Trust him to betray you. He's consistent about that.
string: 真不愧是他，背叛你。这点他倒是始终如一。

original: He screws everyone. Even me. Especially me.
string: 他坑害所有人。连我都逃不过。尤其是我。

original: You've heard of 'buyer's remorse'? Clavicus is remorse incarnate.
string: 听说过"买方后悔"吗？卡拉威库斯就是后悔的化身。

original: You trust Clavicus, you get a Rueful Axe. Lesson learned.
string: 你信任卡拉威库斯，结果得到一把悔恨之斧。教训记住了。

original: What are you-really?
string: 你到底是什么人？

original: I'm Barbas. That's all you need to know.
string: 我是巴巴斯。你只需要知道这些。

original: A Hound of Oblivion. Loyal companion. Occasional menace.
string: 湮灭猎犬。忠实的伙伴。偶尔的威胁。

original: I'm a Daedric spirit. But I'm housebroken.
string: 我是个迪德拉精魂。不过我已经驯服了。

original: The only Daedra with fur and a conscience. Sort of.
string: 唯一拥有毛发和良知的迪德拉。算是吧。

original: A reflection of Clavicus's better nature. Or worse. Hard to say.
string: 卡拉威库斯善良本性的体现。抑或更糟。难以断言。

original: Think of me as Clavicus's leash... except he's the one pulling it.
string: 把我当作卡拉威库斯的牵引绳吧……只不过这次是他牵着我走。

original: A Daedric shapeshifter trapped as man's best friend. Irony, huh?
string: 一位被困于人类最忠实伙伴之躯的迪德拉变形者。讽刺啊，对吧？

original: I'm Oblivion's goodest boy and worst nightmare rolled into one.
string: 我是湮灭最乖巧的男孩，也是最可怕的噩梦——二者合而为一。

original: I'm whatever annoys Clavicus the most. Right now, that's a dog.
string: 我就是最惹恼卡拉威库斯的东西。眼下，那是个狗。

original: Can I keep you as a follower after the quest?
string: 任务结束后，我还能把你当作随从吗？

original: Oh, flattery! But I've got a Daedric Prince to annoy.
string: 哎呀，奉承话！但我得去惹恼一位迪德拉君王呢。

original: Tempting. But Clavicus might frown on a permanent vacation.
string: 诱人。但卡拉威库斯或许会对永久性休假皱眉。

original: Sure, if you like me blocking doors and eating your boots.
string: 当然，如果你喜欢我挡住门还吃掉你的靴子。

original: You couldn't handle me full time. Too much awesome.
string: 你可承受不了我全天候的陪伴。太过耀眼了。

original: I'd say yes, but Clavicus likes to keep me on a short leash.
string: 我本想答应，但卡拉威库斯总爱拴着我，不让我自由行动。

original: I'm flattered. But no. Probably.
string: 我受宠若惊。但不行。大概吧。

original: You'd regret it. I shed. A lot.
string: 你会后悔的。我掉毛。掉很多。

original: I'd love to. But Clavicus would turn you into a sweetroll for trying.
string: 我当然愿意。但卡拉威库斯会把你变成甜卷作为惩罚。

original: Yeah, no. You couldn't afford my contract.
string: 不，你付不起我的契约。

original: Lied? Me? Never! I... simply withheld certain Daedric truths. Totally different
string: 撒谎？我？才不会！我……只是隐瞒了某些迪德拉的真相。完全不同。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Hey, I didn't lie. I said I couldn't join you THEN. This is NOW.
string: 喂，我没说谎。我说的是当时不能和你一起去。现在是现在。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Pfft. Join? Nah. I'm freelancing. Big difference.
string: 噗。加入？才不呢。我可是自由职业者。差远了。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: You're acting like you don't want me around. Rude.
string: 你表现得好像不愿我待在这儿似的。真没礼貌。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: I'm joining you for now. Don't get clingy, mortal.
string: 我暂时陪你。别黏人，凡人。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: You say 'lied,' I say 'creative contract negotiation.'
string: 你说“撒谎”，我说“富有创意的契约谈判”。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Relax. I've got time. Clavicus is busy... counting his regrets.
string: 放松。我有的是时间。卡拉威库斯正忙着……统计他的遗憾。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: You summoned me. That makes this YOUR fault, technically.
string: 是你召唤了我。严格来说，这错在你。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: It's not joining-it's... temporary Daedric consultation services.
string: 这不是加入——是...临时迪德拉咨询服务。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Don't think of me as a follower. Think of me as a sarcastic bodyguard.
string: 别把我当成随从。把我当成一个讽刺的保镖。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Of course I'm joining you. Someone's gotta make sure you don't die pantsless again.
string: 当然要跟你一起去。总得有人确保你不会再光着屁股死掉。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Lied? I didn't lie. I evolved my opinion of you after watching you kill 50 dragons naked.
string: 撒谎？我没撒谎。是在看你赤身裸体杀掉五十条龙之后，我才对你改观的。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Join you? Don't flatter yourself. I'm here for the snacks.
string: 加入你？别自作多情了。我来这儿是为了零食。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Clavicus said I could use this as a 'learning experience.' He meant for YOU.
string: 卡拉威库斯说我能把这事当作"学习经历"。他指的是你。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: This isn't 'joining.' This is babysitting with extra steps.
string: 这可不是"加入"。这不过是带孩子的活儿，还多加了几道工序。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Oh look! The Player toggled my summon spell. Again.
string: 噢看！玩家又切换了我的召唤法术。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Joining you? Nah. You just modded me into your party, didn't you?
string: 加入你们？才不呢。你不过是把我改进了你的队伍里，对吧？

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: This isn't lore-friendly, you know. But let's roll with it.
string: 这不符合设定，你知道的。不过我们姑且这么办吧。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Joining? I call this a hostage situation.
string: 加入？我称之为人质事件。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: You're lucky Clavicus doesn't charge a monthly subscription for me.
string: 你真走运，卡拉威库斯没对我收取月费。

original: You lied! Are you really joining me?
string: 你撒谎！你真的要加入我？

original: Tell me something weird about you.
string: 说说你的怪事吧。

original: I can sniff out Daedra from miles away. Also bacon.
string: 我能从几英里外嗅出迪德拉的气息。还有培根。

original: I once spent a century as a floating eyeball. Don't recommend.
string: 我曾以漂浮眼球的形态过一个世纪。不推荐。

original: I dream in colors mortals can't see. Trippy, huh?
string: 我梦见凡人看不见的色彩。很迷幻吧？

original: Clavicus once turned me into a chair. For a week.
string: 卡拉威库斯曾把我变成一把椅子。整整一周。

original: I've got a better singing voice than most bards. Fight me.
string: 我的歌喉比大多数吟游诗人都好。敢不敢来比比看？

original: I know where all the socks in Nirn go. It's horrifying.
string: 我知道奈恩上所有袜子都去了哪里。这景象令人毛骨悚然。

original: I can fetch souls. Like, literally fetch them. Good boy, me.
string: 我能召唤灵魂。真的，就是字面意义上的召唤。我真是个好孩子。

original: I've been banned from six realms for excessive barking.
string: 我因过度吠叫被六个位面封禁。

original: Sometimes I walk on two legs just to freak people out.
string: 有时我故意用两条腿走路，就为了吓唬人。
